The final shape of this part is a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. The length is 0.75 units, the width is 0.75 units, and the height is 0.625 units.</description>

The first part contributes to the overall cylindrical shape, while the second part acts as an off-centered insert.</description>
